item.title: Ethics of Local LLMs: A Response to Zuckerberg's ''Open Source AI Manifesto''
item.description: the “Open Source AI Manifesto” Mark Zuckerberg has been hated by Richard Stallman for decades and he is the only person who appears on both cover image of the video essays: How the Internet was Stolen and How AI was Stolen by Then & Now.
